skins.shipDescription: F-class destroyer ©` Fortune, Hull Number H70!
skins.selfIntroduction: Royal Navy's F-class destroyer, Fortune. ...I was transferred to the navy of the Maple Monarchy along with my younger sister Foxhound. ...As an F-class destroyer, I have worked hard...
skins.acquisition: Greetings, Commander. I-I'm Fortune... As an F-class destroyer, I'll do my best...
skins.login: Commander, d-did I make you wait? ...I-I'm... *cries*
skins.details: Commander... I worked hard but... am I still not good?
skins.secretaryIdle2: If I'm with my sister, I can go anywhere...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Saskatchewan... a new name bestowed by God...
skins.secretaryTouch: I... I'm causing trouble... aren't I...?

skins.shipDescription: Is this really going to help you, Commander? Ah? I doubt our destiny will change with this... Just kidding, Commander! Anything for you.
skins.acquisition: Can I really be of use with this... Eeeeh?! N-No way! I can't get off the rails! Ugh... Was that... a joke?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Fortune...means 'wealth' in a way. It would be great if I can enrich our fleet.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Ugh... Commander, please let me rest...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Oh God, is such a trial truly necessary...
